com.guitariffic.controller
Class FakeSheetController

java.lang.Object
  com.guitariffic.controller.FakeSheetController

public class FakeSheetController
extends java.lang.Object

Controller class for the FakeSheet interactions. This class will keep a pointer to the FakeSheet object and do all the UI interactions as needed from the View.

Author:
ryszardkilarski

Prompt for filename if we haven't saved this already. Then, save the file.

Parameters:
saveAsFlag - If True, then this is a Save As function. If false, then Save function.
